title: Tardy for the Party
description:
This week Joe hops right up on his soap box to explain how being late for work as a teacher is much different than being late in other professions! He also regales us with a horrific centipede fiasco in the school garden but not before letting us in on a little inside info his School’s Out For Summer tour. Tickets available at mrdtimes3.com!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
